name: As You Wish
description:
A Game made for Grad Jam 2020, a 48hr game jam.

Theme: As You Wish

An action platformer based off the movie "the princess bride".

Controls:

A & D lateral movement

Space jump

left click - attack

right click - lunging attack

Credits:

Eric Balas - Programmer, Level Designer and Animator

Joshua Matthews - Composer and Sound Designer

Vievida Anya - Character and Item Artist

Alex Balas - Environment and UI Artist
